sentences.en: Beckham wore a fetching outfit in purple and green.
sentences.cn: 贝克汉姆穿了一件抢眼的紫绿两色套装。

sentences.en: He spent the first few months on a walking and sketching tour, before fetching up in Dublin.
sentences.cn: 他头几个月的行程都是边走边画，不期然间竟然到了都柏林。

sentences.en: Her whole morning was spent in fetching and carrying.
sentences.cn: 她整个上午都在做杂务.

sentences.en: I helped out in the tents fetching and carrying.
Looking relaxed, the prince helped out fetching bread tomakesome toast.
sentences.cn: 王子看起来很放松, 他正打算做烤面包片.

sentences.en: Property in the area is now fetching ridiculously high prices.
sentences.cn: 现在这个地区房子的价钱高得离谱.

sentences.en: Sue was sitting up in bed, looking very fetching in a flowered bedjacket.
sentences.cn: 休坐在床上，穿着印花宽松短睡衣，显得非常迷人。

sentences.en: The attractive scenery here is fetching in more and more tourists.
sentences.cn: 这里景色宜人,吸引着越来越多的游客.

sentences.en: The beautiful scenery here is fetching in more and more tourists.
sentences.cn: 这里优美的风景吸引了越来越多的旅游者.

sentences.en: The makers are fetching out a new kind of treatment shampoo.
sentences.cn: 制造商正在制造一种新型的营养洗发露.

sentences.en: The new play is fetching large audience every night.
sentences.cn: 这新歌剧每天都吸引许多听众.

sentences.en: The new play is fetching large audiences every night.
sentences.cn: 新剧每晚都吸引来大批观众.

sentences.en: This bus provides clean , concise signals for fetching and storing information.
sentences.cn: 这种总统提供用于存取信息的完整而简捷的信号.

sentences.en: This made the work of fetching water up the hill much easier.
sentences.cn: 从泉中担水上山,就省力多了.

sentences.en: Very fetching, Capitaine. Perhaps you should consider switching sides?
sentences.cn: 非常不错, 上校, 也许你该考虑跳槽?

sentences.en: Your sister looks very fetching in that dress.
sentences.cn: 你妹妹穿那身衣服显得格外动人。

trans.tran_cn: 动人的，吸引人的，迷人的
trans.tran_en: attractive, especially because the clothes you are wearing suit you

trans.tran_cn: 接来（某人）( fetch的现在分词 )，使发出，吸引，售得（若干价钱）
